item.title: Lecture Quiz assigned
item.dc:creator: John T. Foster
item.description:
As I've mentioned in class, there will be no scheduled class period on Thursday, September 4. I've already recorded and posted a lecture for that day on the Course Materials page. Registered students with Canvas access will now notice that an assignment has been posted.
The assignment is to watch the video lecture and take a very short quiz before class on 09/09/2014. The quiz is extremely simple and the material is explicitly from the lecture. It is only intended to enforce that you watch the lecture.

There will be several of these quizzes throughout the semester. The total percentage of correct answers for all quiz grades will count as 1 homework assignment in the overall grading structure.

item.title: Course Materials Page
item.dc:creator: John T. Foster
item.description:
You will notice in the navigation bar a Course Materials tab now. This is where I will post the lecture PDFs and recordings as well as any additional course reference material.

For the recorded lectures, I have clipped them into topical subsections and posted them to the Course YouTube Channel. Clicking the posted link will take you to a YouTube Playlist that will play the individual clips from that lecture in the sequence they were delivered. Feel free to watch/review only the clips that are of interest to you.

For the first lecture there was a little background noise in the audio of first the first few clips. I believe I know what was causing this and will work to correct it in the future.

item.title: Welcome!
item.dc:creator: John T. Foster
item.description: Welcome to the course webpage for PGE 383 - Advanced Geomechanics taught in the Petroleum and Geosystems Engineering Department at The University of Texas at Austin. The course syllabus is available at here and on the navigation bar at the top of the page as well. Soon, there will be assignments posted here as well as additional reference material for the class. Please check this page frequently.
